title: Understanding the Execution Command
text: Executing a query can generally be done by selecting an option or button that signifies running or executing the command you've typed. Think about typical words associated with starting or commencing a task.

title: Recognizing the Command Button
text: Among the options provided, which one is most likely associated with initiating an action in a software program?
choices: Press the Save and Run button.

title: Location of the Button
text: The button used to execute a query is typically found in the toolbar or top menu section of the software interface, often accompanied by icons symbolizing execution, like a green arrow.
